text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Racewear—they are dreams made<n>manifest, a racer's
constant<n>companion, and a symbol of<n>admiration for many.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Amidst the cool touch of the early<n>summer breeze,
Umamusume gear up<n>to partake in a competition to acquire<n>
a unique set of racewear.

Hehe. ♪ I'm glad to see such a large<n>gathering of très bien
diamonds in the<n>rough this year too!

Which of you lovelies will have the<n>honor of adorning
yourself in my<n>wedding dress-inspired racewear, I<n>
wonder?

Now! Without further ado, let us<n>commence the Beauty
Dream Cup<n>model audition! Show me your<n>brilliance! ☆

text_block_list.name: Participant A
text_block_list.text: What?! I didn't hear anything about<n>this!

text_block_list.name: Participant B
text_block_list.text:
I have to do my best... This is my<n>chance to get a set of
racewear all my<n>own!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A few days earlier...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Awww, I wish I could go to Paris!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Me, too! ♪ I'd love to sample all the<n>delicious treats there,
like the cakes<n>and macarons!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Desserts are great and all... But I'm<n>more interested in the
races! Wouldn't<n>you guys like to enter the Beauty<n>Dream
Cup?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Of course! There isn't an<n>Umamusume alive who wouldn't<n>
want to run in the race that unveils<n>Beauty Anshinzawa's
newest works!<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
All her designs are top-tier—there's<n>no one in the fashion
capital of Paris<n>who hasn't heard of her genius!<n>They say
her hands are blessed by<n>the goddess of beauty!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Imagine being able to run as one of<n>her fashion models! The
Umamusume<n>in Paris are so lucky!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Guys, guys! Turn on the TV THIS<n>INSTANT!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
...Ms. Beauty, is it true that you're<n>going to be relocating to
Japan?

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Yes. Something stirred in me afterhearing my sister talk about ourhometown. I just know there are unpolished gems waiting for me toturn them into diamonds!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Is that why you decided to host the<n>Beauty Dream Cup and
its auditions in<n>Japan starting from this year?

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Correct. ♪ The entry requirements are<n>the same as they
were in Paris. As<n>long as they spark my interest,<n>anyone
can enter regardless of their<n>accomplishments or debut
status. ☆

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
And now for a message to the<n>Umamusume beauties of
Japan—I<n>can't wait to see your gorgeous<n>faces at the
auditions! I'll be waitiiing!<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Announcement! This is regarding the<n>URA-authorized Beauty
Dream Cup<n>event usually held in Paris each year!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Henceforth, the event will be held in<n>Japan, following the
relocation of the<n>event organizer, Beauty Anshinzawa.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Furthermore, the audition to decide<n>the muses and models
for her outfits<n>will also be held in Japan.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
The URA would like to encourage<n>students to participate and
further their<n>growth as Umamusume!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
I, too, hope you will all take this<n>chance to expand your
horizons! Good<n>luck!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I wasn't expecting this to become<n>such a big deal... Are you
two going to<n>enter the audition?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! After all, the concept for Beauty<n>Anshinzawa's
racewear design is<n>bridal wear!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Nothing can make a grown-up lady<n>shine brighter than a
wedding dress!<n>I've just gotta get my hands on an<n>outfit
like that!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Me too! As one who aspires to<n>become a princess with
both beauty<n>and strength, I can't miss the chance<n>to get
such a dress and become a<n>muse!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Besides, if I happen to run into a<n>prince in the future, it'll be
much<n>easier to catch him if I get used to<n>running in a dress
now!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! You two sure are fired up for<n>this. I'll have to give it
my all too!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
It would be so buono if we could all<n>run in wedding dresses
together! ♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: The Beauty Dream Cup...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(If I become a muse, maybe it'll help<n>me gain a little more
confidence in<n>myself...)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(Perhaps then I'll be able to run even<n>when there are a lot
of people<n>watching me.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: But...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
What's the matter, Dober? Are you<n>thinking about the
audition?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove... Yes... I just can't muster<n>up the courage to
enter.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I can't help but feel I'm not worthy of<n>being called an
"Umamusume beauty."

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I see. But beauty is in the eye of the<n>beholder, is it not?
Rather than<n>worrying so much, why not simply<n>apply and
let the designer decide?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
You're right. Logically speaking, I<n>know that's the best
thing to do, but<n>I...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: If you don't believe in yourself, thenbelieve in me. At the very least, Ithink you're an Umamusumedeserving of recognition.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Air Groove...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Gracious. The whole school is in an<n>uproar over this
audition.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hm? It's Mother...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Hello, Air Groove! I saw Beauty<n>Anshinzawa's press
conference!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Naturally, you'll be applying for the<n>audition, right? I'll be
your biggest<n>cheerleader!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Oh, this makes me think of when you<n>were younger. Do you
remember<n>what you said when you saw me in<n>my
racewear?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Mother
text_block_list.text:
You said you wanted to be just like<n>me, and that when you
grew up, you<n>were going to get a first-rate designer<n>to
create your very own racewear!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Apparently, Beauty Anshinzawa was<n>an apprentice of the
great designer<n>who created my outfit, you know! Oh,<n>this
must be destiny! ♪

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
She sounded so delighted, there was<n>no way I could tell her
I wasn't<n>planning to audition...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
If I become a muse, my popularity will<n>rise and bring me
closer to my goal of<n>becoming the Empress... I just have<n>
to tell myself that's what it's for...
